items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know whether he should believe Mary or not.
Tom cut the cake with the new knife Mary had given him.
Tom did his best to avoid making eye contact with Mary.
Tom has been going out with Mary for about three years.
Tom has been living in Boston for the last three years.
I left my wallet at home. Could you lend me some money?
Tom went back to the office to get something he forgot.
Tom went for a walk and took pictures of things he saw.
Tom went into the kitchen to see what Mary was cooking.
Tom went into the room and slammed the door behind him.
